content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Dear Isabelle users,

this is a reminder that our Isabelle Workshop 2022 happens on Thu 11-Aug-2022
from 9:00-17:30 on the time zone of Haifa (GMT+3).

Virtual participation works via our own BigBlueButton server at TU MÃ¼nchen,
the link is on the workshop webpage:
https://sketis.net/isabelle/isabelle-workshop-2022

The program and papers are available as well. After the event, speakers are
invited to send slides to me via E-Mail for the same webpage.

Makarius
